reviews.review_msg: He is an amazing prof! super nice and helps all students and responds really fast. his exams are hard af but other than that if you listen and participate you will do amazing. Highly recommend. Very interesting

best prof i've had so far at douglas. Teaches material well and prepares students for the mid-term and final. course consisted of two exams, a paper, 3 reflection summaries, and participation marks. would definitely take another class with him!
